name: Shingata Kururin Pa!
overview: Shingata - Kururin Pa! is the sequel to Kururin Pa!, and is too a 2d puzzle game with 10 different characters and 2 game modes: - Story mode: Play against all the computer characters and try to win them to complete the game. In this mode the player can choose the computer difficulty level (there are 5 different ones, from maniac to beginner) - VS mode: Play against another human player or a computer player opponent in a one-on-one battle. - Practive mode: Practice the game. The gameplay is about that there are some rope pieces that fall from the ceiling, and the player have to join them and when a fire piece appears use it at the end of the joined rope pieces to make them dissapear and send them to the opponent. There are some pieces that have a face form and to make that dissapear they had to be next to some rope pieces and they will dissappear when the fire activate the rope pieces.
